home.section2Desc: I design and build backend systems shaped by real-world needs

about.intro: I build digital solutions focused on real value and user experience.

items.title: Independent and Purpose-Driven
items.desc: I take ownership of every decision I make, from problem approach to solution implementation. Every product I create reflects my mindset, responsibility, and personal standards.

items.title: Turning Ideas into Real Solutions
items.desc: I don't just stop at ideas. Through analysis, testing, and iteration, I transform abstract thoughts into applicable solutions that deliver real value.

items.title: Growing Through Experience
items.desc: Every project, every conversation, and every challenge helps me understand myself better and how I create value. I continuously learn to refine my thinking and skills.

works.title: My Works
works.subtitle: Explore my latest projects and creative solutions

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's create something amazing together.
